about_the_game:
As a scale glider, the ASW 28 maintains the similar outline and appearance of the full-size aircraft. The ASW 28 airframe features durable EPO construction with multiple integrated carbon tubes, which makes it capable of performing various aerobatic maneuvers including loops, rolls, and more.

The ASW 28 is equipped with a power system consisting of a 40A ESC plus a 3542-850Kv motor with a folding propeller. Functional flaps, metal-geared servos, and ball-link-equipped linkages provide positive control and ensure excellent performance. The large battery compartment fits 3S to 4S 2200-3300mAh batteries for a wide range of performance and flight times.
detailed_description:
As a scale glider, the ASW 28 maintains the similar outline and appearance of the full-size aircraft. The ASW 28 airframe features durable EPO construction with multiple integrated carbon tubes, which makes it capable of performing various aerobatic maneuvers including loops, rolls, and more.

The ASW 28 is equipped with a power system consisting of a 40A ESC plus a 3542-850Kv motor with a folding propeller. Functional flaps, metal-geared servos, and ball-link-equipped linkages provide positive control and ensure excellent performance. The large battery compartment fits 3S to 4S 2200-3300mAh batteries for a wide range of performance and flight times.

short_description: The ASW 28 2.0m electric sailplane is one of the most maneuverable, highest-performance gliders from Tower Hobbies. It is also a high-level product that takes full advantage of accumulated design experience and technical solutions from many years of development.
